an inclusive price or cost includes everything
The fully inclusive fare for the trip is £22.
The rent is £120 a week, inclusive of heating.
including a wide variety of people, things etc
Not everyone shares his vision of an inclusive America.
an inclusive price, cost etc includes everything that has to be paid or includes the cost of a particular thing
The stated price is inclusive of meals.
including 1 and 10 and all the numbers in between, July and January and all the months in between etc
including everything, for example flight, hotel and meals, in the price
inclusive package tours to the Costa Brava
